keyMoments.title: Defeats Neptune's Army
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates completely overwhelm and defeat Neptune's military forces, with both ministers suffering critical injuries.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates their overwhelming power and control over Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Officers Consume Energy Steroids
keyMoments.description: All four officers consume Energy Steroid pills to enhance their strength before fighting the princes.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's reliance on performance-enhancing drugs and willingness to pay the terrible price.

keyMoments.title: Officers Defeat the Three Princes
keyMoments.description: The Energy Steroid-enhanced officers brutally defeat Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, and Manboshi, eliminating the royal family's strongest defenders.
keyMoments.significance: A crushing victory that leaves Fish-Man Island without hope of conventional rescue.

keyMoments.title: Neptune Army Defeated
keyMoments.description: The Neptune Family's military forces are completely defeated by the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Leaves the royal family vulnerable with their king captive and their army destroyed.

keyMoments.title: The Three Princes Arrive
keyMoments.description: The three princes of the Neptune Family arrive at Gyoncorde Plaza to challenge the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The royal family's strongest warriors enter the battle to rescue their father.

keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi Upholds Otohime's Vision
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi delivers a speech carrying forward Queen Otohime's vision of peace and coexistence.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the royal family's commitment to peace despite violent opposition.

keyMoments.title: The Princes Defeated
keyMoments.description: The three princes are brutally defeated by Hody's officers, leaving the royal family without defenders.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating loss that crushes hope for conventional rescue of Fish-Man Island.

keyMoments.title: Vander Decken Plots Destruction
keyMoments.description: After being rejected by Shirahoshi, Vander Decken formulates a plan to use the Flying Dutchman to destroy everything.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the next phase of the crisis at Fish-Man Island.
